title.narrative: Danish support to "Foundation of the Future"

description.narrative:
Foundation for the Future supports independent Projects related to civil society and democracy in the Middle East and North Africa. The Work of the foundation is demand driven by civil society organisations. The main focus of the activities is democracy promotion, reform, civic participation, human rights and women's rights. The foundation also gives support to research and capacity building and holds conferences related to the foundations main focus areas. To the extent possible the project will have a focus on empowerment of women and their rights in Libya.
The Foundation¿s contributions have directly impacted partner organizations in the program, including but not limited to roundtables, workshops, training of trainers (TOT), conferences and funding for projects, has increased the capacity of leaders in civil society and the public sphere to be actively engaged in driving change regarding democratic transition, Human Rights, and women¿s equality. The efforts have stimulated greater awareness and understanding of these issues relevant to the local environment that can be passed on through further initiatives, enhanced on the local and nation level through active participation in civil society and the public sphere and fostered through increased civil society-government communication.
